Ch 3: Data and Signals - Analog and Digital

1. Periodic and Aperiodic Analog Signals: 16.c, 17.b, 18.c, 19, 20 and 21.
2. Digital Signals: 24, 26, 29
3. Transmission Impairments: 30, 32, 37
4. Data Rate Limits: 38, 42, 43
5. Performance of Transmission System: 47, 48
